# Project Introduction 

The  **New York State Environemntal Carcinogens Action Team**, is a group consisting of several environemntal leaders in NYS, including WE ACT for environemntal Justice. The action team has three working groups: 

- Modeling Working Group 
- Education and Communication Working Group 
- Policy Working Group 

This report outlines some initial analyis performed by the **modeling working group**. The goal of the modeling working group is to identify potential environemntal carcinogens to support preventitive action for cancers with high incidence including but not limited to: 

- Lung cancer 
- Breast Cancer 
- Colorectal Cancer 

The modeling working group uses public environmental and cancer data to test the association of given risk factors with cancer diagnosis.
